name: Refactor user authentication module
description: Improve the security and readability of the existing user authentication code. Consider extracting logic into smaller functions and adding more comprehensive error handling.

name: Build a new UI for profile settings
description: Design and implement a new user interface for managing profile settings. Ensure it's responsive and user-friendly. Requires form handling and API integration.

name: Optimize database query for reports
description: The current query for generating monthly sales reports is slow. Analyze the query, identify bottlenecks, and optimize it for better performance. May involve indexing or query restructuring.

name: Write E2E tests for checkout flow
description: Develop end-to-end tests to cover the entire user checkout process, from adding items to cart to successful payment confirmation.

name: Integrate with a third-party payment gateway
description: Add support for a new payment gateway (e.g., Stripe, PayPal) by integrating their API into our backend services.

name: Setup CI/CD pipeline for automated deployment
description: Configure a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline using GitHub Actions or Jenkins to automate the build, test, and deployment process.
